Articles.Content:
I've seen this on on some other forums and I will post it here.

Basically someone posts a song, you rate it on a scale of 1 - 10, a small opinion on it, then post your song

I'll go:

 It's alright, but the subject matter doesn't really lend itself to music IMO.
